1085580.name: Fantasy Grounds - Dungeon Crawl Classics #86: Hole in the Sky (DCC)
1085580.description:
Dungeon Crawl Classics #86: Hole in the Sky

A Level 0 Adventure for DCC RPG
The Lady in Blue, a mysterious figure of cosmic power, enlists a band of simple peasants for a strange task.
They are to follow an invisible bridge until they arrive at a hole in the sky - and then jump through.
Death awaits all but the bravest, strongest, and luckiest, but the Lady offers a reward beyond all the riches of the world: the chance to change the very stars these peasants were born under, and thus change their destiny.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Swartz
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Dungeon Crawl Classics ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
